text: A yesli by My pozhelali, to vozvysili by yego imya. No on prinik k zemle i posledoval za svoyey strast'yu i podoben on sobake: yesli brosish'sya na neye, vysovyvayet yazyk i, yesli ostavish' yeye, vysovyvayet. Eto - pritcha o lyudyakh, kotoryye schitali lozh'yu Nashi znameniya. Rasskazyvay zhe rasskazom, - mozhet byt', oni razmyslyat
